# PlainChildcare â€” Childcare Cost Data

> PlainChildcare provides free access to childcare prices across the United States, sourced from the U.S. Department of Labor Women's Bureau National Database of Childcare Prices (NDCP).

## Data Coverage
- Childcare costs by county for center-based and family-based care
- Age groups: infant, toddler, preschool, school-age
- Historical data (2018-2022)
- Affordability ratios (cost vs median household income)
- All 50 states + DC

## Data Source
U.S. Department of Labor, Women's Bureau, National Database of Childcare Prices (NDCP)
https://www.dol.gov/agencies/wb/topics/childcare/price-data

## Pages
- Homepage: https://plainchildcare.com/
- State directory: https://plainchildcare.com/state
- County profiles: https://plainchildcare.com/county/{slug}
- Rankings: https://plainchildcare.com/rankings
- Affordability calculator: https://plainchildcare.com/calculator
- Search: https://plainchildcare.com/search
